item.title: Using Hugo for My Blog
item.description: I recently decided to update my blog. I had brielfy touched Hugo before and I have used it again. It really is a wonderful tool for content. After almost 4 years at GDS, I’m moving on to FutureLearn. This blog signals the start of this new chapter in my career.
